mapper.select: SELECT m.email email , m.nickname nickname , m.member_grade member_grade , m.member_state member_state , m.introduce introduce , m.business_number business_number , i.path path FROM member m LEFT OUTER JOIN image i ON m.email = i.email WHERE m.email=#{email}
SELECT DISTINCT addr2 FROM location WHERE addr1 = #{addr1}
SELECT DISTINCT addr3 FROM location WHERE addr2 = #{addr2}
SELECT location_number FROM location WHERE addr1 = #{addr1} AND addr2 = #{addr2} AND addr3 = #{addr3}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO question ( email, question_category, title, content, member_check ) VALUES ( #{email}, #{question_category}, #{title}, #{content}, #{member_check} )
INSERT INTO image ( question_number, original_name, save_name, path, size ) VALUES ( (SELECT MAX(question_number) FROM question) , #{original_name}, #{save_name}, #{path}, #{size} )
mapper.select: SELECT l.location_number location_number , l.addr1 addr1 , l.addr2 addr2 , l.addr3 addr3 , i.interest_location_number interest_location_number FROM location l INNER JOIN (SELECT location_number, interest_location_number FROM interest_location WHERE email = #{email}) i ON l.location_number = i.location_number
